message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this product at a special price of $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, even at this price.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,000 is still out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
